snippet.title: Massmouth 2 - Longplay / Playthrough - Part 01
snippet.description:
This is a longplay / playthrough for the great "Massmouth 2" modification for Doom2 made by Mike "Cyb" Watson. IMHO one of the best Zdoom mods ever made.

Played using Zdoom 2.0.60 (the original version this was intended for ... rather than a later version or even GZDoom which breaks various gameplay sensitive things) recorded using FRAPS 3.0.0 and encoded using Virtualdub 1.9.5 and x264vfw.

Please note this is intended to show the basic gameplay and storyline ... rather than being a let's play/walkthrough/level guide or whatever ... You'll see me running into dead ends, revisiting places when not needed  and sucking in combat ... also I'm trying to keep secrets down to a minimum (the first 3 maps already have 2 easter eggs ... as well as the existance of a secret level [which is hidden in a rather cool, but not too difficult way]).
Video quality is nowhere near the best (since fraps is currently annoying the shit out of me with it's ocassional and random framedropping)

If the video has you in the mood to play, you can get the outdated version of Zdoom (which runs fine under WinXP) here:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/zdoom/files/ 
as well as Massmouth2 in the /idgames archives:
http://www.doomworld.com/idgames/index.php?id=12090

Other parts will follow soon-ish
